DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ability oral doxycycline decrease colonization Propionibacterium acnes dermis shoulder .
DOC.brief_title: Does Preoperative Administration Oral Doxycycline Decrease Colonization Rate Propionibacterium Acnes Dermis Shoulder ?
DOC.criteria: All male patient ( > 18 year age ) undergo shoulder arthroscopy Female patient patient active acne patient take antibiotic past month doxycycline allergy benzoyl peroxide allergy clindamycin allergy patient psoriatic/eczematous lesion shoulder girdle .
